name: Cavalier Geneve - USA Exclusive - Petit Corona
additionalNotes:
If you’re a fan of the 24-karat gold foil diamond that graces the wrapper of all Cavalier Genève stogies, you’re going to love the gold-adorned Cavalier Genève USA Exclusive cigar. In addition to the gold diamond, there’s an attractive gold-colored metal foot band, and the gold horse on the 
Beneath all this flash is a medium-dark brown Mexican San Andrés wrapper that covers Cuban seed long-fillers and a binder from Nicaragua. Once lit,
